name: Targets (Archlong)
description:
Loosely inspired by skeet shooting, Targets is a simple casual game about shooting objects out of the sky.

Move your head to target objects and tap the screen to shoot.

Normal mode: shoot as many objects as you can until you drop three.
Timed mode: shoot as many objects as you can in sixty seconds.
Hundred mode: shoot as many objects as you can out of a hundred.

That's it!
